Package agh.alleviation.service

Class OrderService

java.lang.Object
agh.alleviation.service.EntityObjectService<Order,​OrderRepository>
agh.alleviation.service.OrderService
@Service
public class OrderService
extends EntityObjectService<Order,​OrderRepository>
Service responsible for manipulating order and ticket repositories.
Author:
Ksenia Fiodarava
See Also:
OrderRepository, Order, Ticket
